title: Do regular highlighter pens wash off whiteboards? - Quora

response.answer_text: Good question and in truth we are not sure. So, we will run a few tests using our magnetic wallcovering that has whiteboard finish to see if the regular spray cleaner also removes highlighter pen marks. Will revert shortly… Jeremy - co-founder MagScapes[1] Footnotes[1] British company makes magnetic wallpapers and materials for interiors

There is a way to remove the ink from almost any kind of marker from a whiteboard, but it’s wisest to avoid making those marks in the first place. The trick to removing marker ink from a whiteboard is to take the same marker you accidentally wrote on the board with, replicate the marks you just made, copying over your original lines exactly, and then immediately wipe the marks off the board while the ink is still wet.
